This is the central resource for updates to the IUCN Global Ecosystem Typology (GET).

This site contains information about the [governance](governance.qmd) of the IUCN GET, the [nomination process](nomination.qmd) for proposed updates, the [register of proposed updates](register.qmd) and their implementation.


### Public register of proposed adjustments and outcomes

This is a register of recent changes. See a full list [here](register.qmd).
